entities.name: gryffindor portrait hole
entities.description: The Gryﬀindor portrait hole is a location where the Fat Lady is hiding. It is mentioned that Harry will be able to move them back in tomorrow.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a person who refused to let Black in without the password and was attacked by him. She is still very distressed.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is a person who tried to enter the Gryﬀindor portrait hole without the password and was refused by the Fat Lady.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who will restore the Fat Lady once she's calmed down.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who searched for Black on the third ﬂoor and in the dungeons.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Trelawney is a professor whose room in the Astronomy tower has been searched.

entities.name: argyllshire
entities.description: Argyllshire is a location where the Fat Lady is hiding in a map.

relationships.description: Black attacked the Fat Lady without the password.
Snape searched for Black on the third ﬂoor and in the dungeons.
Filch will restore the Fat Lady once she's calmed down.
Trelawney's room in the Astronomy tower has been searched for Black.
